actions.description: The drow makes three Scimitar or Arcane Eruption attacks. The drow can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 27 (6d8) poison damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (8d8) force damage, and the drow can push the target up to 10 feet away if it is a Large or smaller creature.
actions.name: Arcane Eruption

actions.description:
The drow casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
At will: dancing lights, mage armor, mage hand, message

3/day each: dimension door, fireball, invisibility

1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
